title.bibl: Die Abendpost, June 28th, 1892. The German Boxmakers.

div.bibl: Die Abendpost, June 28th, 1892. The German Boxmakers.

body.p: The German Boxmakers won their strike, which was given to an arbitration-court. The latter decided to accept 121/2c per hour for apprentices and 171/2 per hour for framers. The decision was accepted By the Union and the Box factories as the new wage-scale.
All box-makers went back to their factories, which are way behind in their output of boxes.
